pr_title: Modified Necryael slaying clue scroll raw text to reflect reality.

timeline.message: Modified Necryael slaying clue scroll raw text to reflect reality.

timeline.body:
This is missing the trailing period.
```suggestion
		new SkillChallengeClue("Kill a Nechryael.", "slay a nechryael in the slayer tower."),
```
timeline.bodyText:
This is missing the trailing period.
  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		new SkillChallengeClue("Kill a Nechryael.", "slay a nechryael in the slayer tower"),
          
          
            
            		new SkillChallengeClue("Kill a Nechryael.", "slay a nechryael in the slayer tower."),
timeline.bodyHTML:
This is missing the trailing period.

Suggested change
new SkillChallengeClue("Kill a Nechryael.", "slay a nechryael in the slayer tower"),
new SkillChallengeClue("Kill a Nechryael.", "slay a nechryael in the slayer tower."),
timeline.author: Nightfirecat
